definition: eager to win/competitive/aggressive
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
competitive/ambitious and aggressive/to desire to beat others

sentences.english: Yoshikatsu heart so that she was always excellence, and strive to achieve top.
sentences.chinese: 好勝心讓她不斷地精益求精，努力做到最頂尖。

sentences.english: Zhou Jianwei with mother spoil love grow up, develop aggressive personality.
sentences.chinese: 周健偉在母親的溺愛呵護下長大，養成好勝的性格。

sentences.english: On court, Yao was pugnacious but never repugnant.
sentences.chinese: 在球場上，姚明十分好勝，但從不令人反感。

sentences.english: Michelle admits she is extremely competitive.
sentences.chinese: 成美承認我自己非常好勝。

sentences.english: Water dampens any inherent aggression and impulse of this powerfulsign.
sentences.chinese: 水能冷卻任何內在的好勝心和要強的衝動。

sentences.english: Besides overcome contend for strong emulative , overcome envious psychology even additionally.
sentences.chinese: 除了克服爭強好勝，另外還要克服嫉妒心理。

sentences.english: My sister likes to chop logic with others, because she is very emulative.
sentences.chinese: 我妹妹喜歡強詞奪理，因爲她非常好勝。

sentences.english: Instead it seems that people's competitive orientation was stronger than their motivation to communicate.
sentences.chinese: 相反，似乎人們的爭強好勝比他們交流的動機更強烈。

sentences.english: Ron Artest used to hate Kobe's guts on the court.
sentences.chinese: 阿泰曾討厭科比在場上的勇氣和好勝心。

sentences.english: Her indifference aroused perhaps his combative soul.
sentences.chinese: 她的冷若冰霜也許激起了他好勝的靈魂。

sentences.english: The conqueror is driven and competitive, but not necessarily competitive with other people.
sentences.chinese: 征服者很爭強好勝，但不一定是和別人爭。

sentences.english: In school and at home, my daughter loves to win.
sentences.chinese: 在學校和家裏，我女兒喜歡爭強好勝。

sentences.english: She seek to prevail over others, unyielding spirit lets me admire.
sentences.chinese: 她爭強好勝，不服輸的精神讓我佩服。

sentences.english: Weechee was very competitive, and participated in rafting races with fellow Ewoks regularly.
sentences.chinese: 威奇爭強好勝，常與其他伊渥克一起參加木筏比賽。
